data: Twm Shôn Catti | Sir John Wynne
Twm Shôn Catti was the natural son of Sir John Wynne, of Gwydir, bart.

The Adventures and Vagaries of Twm Shôn Catti
Descriptive of Life in Wales: Interspersed with Poems
T. J. Llewelyn (Thomas Jeffery Llewelyn) Prichard
